lead_paragraph: Senators return to the Capitol this week for more close-quarters combat over the economy, before heading home on summer recess to continue the battle long-distance.
snippet: For senators in either party, that economic fight is only partly about the economy. It's also about dogma.

headline.main: Why Both Parties Want an Economic Fight

abstract: For senators in either party, that economic fight is only partly about the economy. It's also about dogma.
